summary.description: comprehensive antibiotic resistance detection from Burkholderia pseudomallei genomes | Comprehensive resistance detection from WGS data | ARDaP - Antimicrobial Resistance Detection and Prediction | ARDaP was written by Derek Sarovich (@DerekSarovich) (University of the Sunshine Coast, Australia) with database construction, code testing and feature design by Danielle Madden (@dmadden9), Eike Steinig (@EikeSteinig) (Australian Institute of Tropical Health and Medicine, Australia) and Erin Price (@Dr_ErinPrice)
summary.name: ARDaP
